CustomField.description: This field is populated on creation from an object relationship and kept in sync with the by code in ReferenceMPSC.cls A Reference MPSC record is created 2 ways. 1) A Case with record type 'Service Onboarding MPSC Core Payroll Case' reaches step 6. That update triggers a Case with 'MPSC Transfer Case' record type to be created and a Reference MPSC record. In this situation, the Payroll IC will be the Case Owner of the Case with the record type of 'Service Onboarding MPSC Core Payroll Case'. 2) A Case wtih 'MPSC Transfer Case' record type can also be created manually which will create a Reference MPSC record. In this situation, the Payroll IC will not be populated and it should not be needed.
CustomField.label: Payroll IC
